channel.title: How do i make myself admin?
channel.description: Me and my freind have just started a server but our player rights are 0, so i went into charecters and edited it to 3 but it still didnt workand it kept changing it back to 0 , can someone help?

item.title: How do i make myself admin?
item.dc:creator: @devilsknite0 devilsknite0
item.description:
@devilsknite0 wrote:

go into the files and find client.class
( Tested On SoulScape And Worked :3 )
Edit --> Find Next* --> world
Click Untill You See This:
// “this world is full”
or something close to that. Now go up and find where it has all the admin lists.
It Should Look Something Like This:
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“account1”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“account2”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“account3”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“account4”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“account5”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“account6”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“account7”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“account8”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“account9”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“account10”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“account11”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“account12”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“account13”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“account14”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}

Now At The Top Add Yourself To One Of The playerRights = 3;

*Find Next Is The Easiest So You Don’t Have To Keep Going Back If you Have The Older Version Of NotePad

– Please Tell Me If This Works Because It Was Tested On SoulScape By Me And A Person Named Hikaru…

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make myself admin?
